chapters.title: Chapter 17: Secrets
chapters.info: Lyrelle, p. 427 (514)—Sitter for the Blue Ajah in Salidar. She is firmly under Lelaine's influence. She was one of only three sitters to stand for war with Tar Valon when the vote was first called. She is tall for a Cairhienin, though that means she is only of average height. Some say she was a dancer before becoming a novice.
